title: "L7 Defense integrates its AI-based, API security solution Ammune with NVIDIA BlueField-2"
excerpt: "Furthermore, it does not interfere with the day-to-day efficiency of serving applications. Installed on BlueField-2, the Ammune real-time AI workload is offloaded to the BlueField-2 DPU, reducing nodes' CPU usage for security to the essential minimum."
